content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I am delighted to have you here. Let's discuss the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that the apartment is in great condition, but the market is competitive. Considering the average price for a one-bedroom apartment in the city center, I propose 450 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the proposed price is too low for such a newly built and ideally located apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the quality and location of the apartment, I propose 550 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That sounds more like it. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe there is still room for improvement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given the quality of the apartment and its location, I propose 600 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That's more like it. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe there is still room for improvement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the condition and location of the apartment, I propose 650 euros per month.

content: That's a better offer. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe there is still room for improvement.
